add_environment(scene, sh, w, materialsR, materialsS, ...)

Adds a PlantGL Shape to the Photon Mapping scene.

addLightDirectionPgl(sc, scale_factor)

photonmap.Loader.LoadEnvironment.add_environment(scene: photonmap.libphotonmap_core.Scene, sh: Shape, w: int, materialsR: dict, materialsS: dict, materialsT: dict, is_only_lamp=False)[source]

Adds a PlantGL Shape to the Photon Mapping scene. :param scene: A libphotonmap_core Scene :param sh: The plantGL Shape to add :param w: The wavelength of the light to simulate. :param materialsR: The materials reflectance dictionary :param materialsT: The materials transmittance dictionary :return:
